title: Rise of fascist youth vs student revolts of 1968

content.question: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes. Contrast the historical context, beliefs, and behavior of European youth represented by these two photographs.

frqParts.text: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes. Contrast the historical context, beliefs, and behavior of European youth represented by these two photographs.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
